attributes.action: Stop grants on Warmfront Heating Systems going to Fat Cat Landlords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Tax Payer is funding grants that provide heating systems to tennants of Fat Cat Landlords if the tennant applies for a new system under the Warmfront scheme. If a tennant does not have a reliable heating system then the government should make the landlord provide one!
